name: Mission Extreme
description:
< S t o r y >
A secret terrorist organisation has created a secret super weapon 
and are threatning to blow up america! We dont know exactly what
it is but we are not taking any risks. They have kidnapped 20 hostages
and that is why we are sending you in. Your the best we have!
Good Luck!!

< C o n t r o l s >
Move :Arrow Keys
Jumping :X
Shoot :Z
Up+Shoot :Grenade
Down :Jump Down
ESC :End game

< H i n t s >
-Look around for hidden places.
-Save your grenades for the bosses.
-Save all the hostages you can, they give you extra lifes.
-Pickup all the guns, they upgrade your weapon.

< C r e d i t s >
---------------
